root.content:
Felix... Felix! Wake up!
We have to go NOW!
You wake up slowly in a daze.

s1.content: Don't worry about who I am.

s2.content: I know where we are, thats all that matters.

s3.content: You reach a hill and see a bridge in the distance.

s4.content:
You walk on the bridge and it starts to shake.
You hear a growling sound form underneath...
decisions: Put your head down and run!
Look over the side and see whats underneath
Curl up into the fetile position and pray to JC

s5.content: While taking a seat you look up at the stars and doze off.

s6.content: You suddenly wake up to the sound of a screeching troll?

s7.content:
You trip on a rock and gash your head on a branch.
Blood is gushing from your skull.
This doesn't look good...

s8.content:
Right when you look over a arrow pierces your shoulder.
The troll is angry.

s9.content:
What's that smell?
Oh dear, you have shat your shorts.
Even the troll is disgusted.

s10.content:
The wildabeast charges at full speed.
The troll takes a poop.
